data.text: @PureBloodKiwi Easy. They stopped testing. No cases if theres no test results.
@PureBloodKiwi @PugHodl They work how they were intended. https://t.co/gMsb95Y6ow
@PureBloodKiwi Blocking transmission routes is effective for all infectious diseases

@PureBloodKiwi @NMadeinNZ The literally nailed people’s doors shut in China to stop people with Covid leaving their homes. We haven’t tried that in Aotearoa yet. Something to look forward to, ay? https://t.co/Mr2wfSnzv8
@PureBloodKiwi China are liars. They were suddenly covid free as soon as the west went into lockdown.  I'm not sure why others don't question this.
